com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface IViewService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes:
ViewService
public interface IViewService
extends IService

The interface for the ViewService class The ViewService class provides services to manipuate view objects in the database.

Author:
Sajid and Rema / Michelle Bachler

Method Detail

addMemberNode

NodePosition addMemberNode(PCSession session,
                           View view,
                           NodeSummary node,
                           int x,
                           int y,
                           java.util.Date creation,
                           java.util.Date modification)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
Adds a node to this view at the given x and y coordinate without formatting data Be warned: This node will not display correctly in the Compendium UI

Parameters:
session - the PCSession instance for the current database Model.
view, - the View instance to add the node to.
node - the NodeSummary instance to add
x, - The X coordinate of the node in the view
y, - The Y coordinate of the node in the view
creation, - the creation date for this nodeview record.
modification, - the last modified date for this viewnode record.
Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodePosition, the nodeposition if the node was successfully added, null otherwise
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
See Also:
INodePosition

NodePosition addMemberNode(PCSession session,
                           View view,
                           NodeSummary node,
                           int x,
                           int y,
                           java.util.Date creation,

                           int nWrapWidth,
                           int nFontSize,
                           java.lang.String sFontFace,
                           int nFontStyle,
                           int nForeground,
                           int nBackground)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
Adds a node to this view at the given x and y coordinate

Parameters:
session - com.compendium.core.datamodel.PCSession the session object for the current database Model.
view - com.compendium.core.datamodel.View the view to add the node to.
node - com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodeSummary the node to add
x - The X coordinate of the node in the view
y - The Y coordinate of the node in the view
creation - the creation date for this nodeview record.
modification - the last modified date for this viewnode record.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.
Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodePosition the nodeposition if the node was successfully added, null otherwise
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
See Also:
INodePosition

                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Update the formatting properties for the given node in all its views.

Parameters:
session - com.compendium.core.datamodel.PCSession the session object for the current database Model.
sNodeID - the node id of the node to update the formatting in all view for.
modification - the last modified date for this viewnode record.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
